subroutine bubblesort(array, n)

    integer(kind=8), intent(inout) :: array(:)

    integer, intent(in) :: n

    integer :: i, j, temp 

    do i=1,n-1

        do j=1,n-i

            if ( array(j) > array(j+1) ) then 

                temp = array(j)

                array(j) = array(j+1)

                array(j+1) = temp 

            end if 

        end do 

    end do 

end subroutine

    integer(kind=8), intent(inout) :: arr(:)

    integer, intent(in) :: size 

    integer :: i, j, min_idx 

    do i=1, size 

        min_idx = i 

        do j=i+1, size 

            if( arr(j) < arr(min_idx) ) min_idx = j 

        end do 

        if ( min_idx /=i ) then 

            ! swap 

            temp = arr(i)

            arr(i) = arr(min_idx)

            arr(min_idx) = temp 

        end if 

    end do
